I rarely write negative reviews because I always try to find something positive to say. That said, I hope this review gives them a chance to improve.
This was my first time ordering the boneless chicken with fries, and unfortunately, it was a big letdown. The chicken was undercooked, and the sauce had no flavor, it honestly tasted off like a chemical. I also tried their Dubai chocolate, and it was one of the worst I‚Äôve had. On a positive note, their Salaam Coke was actually really good, it was my first time trying it. Also, the person at the register was very friendly and polite. Overall, the food was a huge disappointment, especially for the price I paid. Maybe I‚Äôll give them another chance sometime in the future, but for now, I can‚Äôt recommend it based on this experience.

First time ordering and definitely the last. I ordered two wing combos with cheese fries, and everything was just awful. The garlic parmesan wings had no flavor at all, the chicken was tough, hard to chew, and had a weird soapy taste ‚Äî like it was washed in dish soap. Completely inedible.

The fries were soggy, and the cheese had a sour taste like it had gone bad. Absolutely disgusting. My daughter got the mild wings, took one bite, and couldn‚Äôt eat the rest. She said they tasted weird too ‚Äî and she‚Äôs not picky.

I was expecting good wings and decent food, but this was a total letdown. For what I paid, this was unacceptable. Never ordering from here again
